title: Wife drags naked woman through streets after catching her in bed with husband
text:
The wife was filmed marching a woman naked through the streets of Sao Paulo in Brazil (Picture: Viral Press) A wife has been filmed marching a woman naked through the streets after catching her in bed with her husband. 
Footage of the betrayed woman marching the girl along a pavement has emerged online after it was shot in Sao Paolo, Brazil, last month.
Terminally ill mother dies days after saying goodbye to husband on his death bed Moments before the video begins the wife is said to have burst in on her husband and the 20-year-old in bed and pounced on her, slashing her hair with a razor.
The video then shows her clutching the woman by the hair as she marches through the streets with two men, said to be her teenage sons, shouting to grab attention.
According to Metropoles , the wife later took to social media to boast about the attack writing: ‘I do not give a damn what they think or stop thinking.

Police are now investigating the incident (Picture; Viral Press) The wife is said to have slashed the love rival’s hair with a razor (Picture: Viral Press) ‘I’ll show you how you deal with the traitors of a married man. I just got this sl*t with my husband, ex-husband from today.’
Police initially launched an investigation to find the victim but she later visited a local station to make a statement.
She told officers that the man had claimed to be single and they had been together for five months.
A spokesman at the regional police station in Cubatao said the alleged attacker had been questioned and the case is under investigation.
